articles.author: Mirudhula
articles.title: New antiviral with 99.9 pc efficacy against Covid-19 developed - DTNext
articles.description: An international team of scientists, from Australia and the US, has developed an experimental direct-acting antiviral therapy that can reduce viral load by 99.9 per cent and may be a new treatment against Covid-19.

articles.author: India Today Television
articles.title: WATCH: Usage of steroids to treat Covid-19 - India Today
articles.description: In order to treat coronavirus, steroids in the early stage can replicate the virus. However, the misuse of steroids can also cause pneumonia, mucormycosis, top doctors have warned. India Today spoke to top doctors on treating Covid-19 by using steroids.

articles.title: Covid-linked mucormycosis: Keep diabetes in control, avoid steroids, say doctors - The Indian Express
articles.description: Covid Associated Mucormycosis (CAM) has been associated with high morbidity and mortality, exorbitant treatment costs and has led to shortage of antifungal drugs.
